tool_description: Get complete list of all economic events. Filter by countries & dates
title: 📅 Economic Events Calendar 🚀

api_list.name: Events
api_list.description:
Get all economic events 
Filter by countries symbols like: US, JP, GB and so on. You can add multiple separating by comma or remove to get all events.
Filter by date: from & to using date in format 2023-05-09

constraints.conditional: from, to: if either from or to is provided, the other should also be included to define a date range.
